title: Jibe, ouster & quick U-turn: K‚Äôtaka minister now backs Rahul's 'vote theft' claim
content: KN Rajanna, a senior Congress MLA recently dropped from the Karnataka cabinet, plans to meet with party leaders in Delhi to address perceived misconceptions about him. His removal followed critical remarks regarding alleged electoral roll lapses during the party's governance. Despite the controversy, Rajanna pledged his commitment to the party and supported Rahul Gandhi's "vote theft" claims.

title: 'Countering terrorism': US designates BLA terror outfit; decision after Asim Munir's visit
content: The United States has officially designated the Balochistan Liberation Army (BLA) and its armed wing, the Majeed Brigade, as Foreign Terrorist Organizations (FTOs). This decision, announced by the State Department, underscores the Trump administration's commitment to countering terrorism.

title: 'Liberation Day': Why is Trump taking over Washington DC? All you need to know about crackdown
content: US President Trump has declared a federal takeover of Washington, DC, citing concerns over crime and homelessness. He termed it as ‚ÄúLiberation Day‚Äù and promised a crackdown, deploying federal agents and the National Guard. While official data indicates a decline in violent crime, Trump's move follows an attack on a government staffer.

title: 'I will know in mins if we can make deal': Trump on meeting with Putin
content: Donald Trump announced he will meet with Vladimir Putin in Alaska on August 15, 2025, expressing confidence he'll quickly determine if a peace deal with Ukraine is possible. Trump aims for a ceasefire and plans to engage Putin, followed by discussions with Volodymyr Zelenskyy and other European leaders. He criticised Zelenskyy's stance on territorial concessions, suggesting potential land swaps.

title: Rohit Sharma buys the most expensive car of his life ‚Äì price tag is just wild
content: Indian cricket star Rohit Sharma has acquired a striking red Lamborghini Urus SE, personalized with the number plate '3015'. This unique number cleverly combines his children's birthdays and his iconic jersey number, 45. The powerful SUV boasts impressive specifications, including 800hp and rapid acceleration. Sharma's car collection also features other luxury vehicles like BMW and Mercedes-Benz models.

title: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella to staff: Not enough to be a software factory; calls for innovation
content: Microsoft is undergoing a significant shift, transitioning from a software manufacturer to an "intelligence engine," according to CEO Satya Nadella. This transformation aims to democratize AI, empowering global users to create their own intelligent tools. Microsoft will focus on building AI systems that enable individuals and organizations to develop customized solutions, redesigning its technology stack to support this new vision.

title: D-Street: Why markets are not taking Trump's tariff threats 'seriously'
content: Despite Trump's threat of 50% tariffs on Indian goods and Russian oil purchases, Indian stock markets have been resilient, driven by strong performances in key sectors and fresh foreign fund inflows. Market sentiment improved following the announcement of a US-Russia summit to discuss the Ukraine conflict, coupled with robust domestic mutual fund inflows and attractive valuations.

title: KL Rahul's unique birthday wish for 'Ajja' Suniel Shetty
content: KL Rahul shared a heartfelt birthday message for his father-in-law, Suniel Shetty, while reflecting on India's impressive 2-2 series draw against England. Rahul highlighted the team's resilience in the absence of key players like Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma, emphasizing the significance of the result for Indian Test cricket's future.

title: Trump 'liberates' US Capital: Puts police under his control, deploys National Guard
content: Donald Trump declared a plan to 'liberate' Washington, D.C., citing concerns over crime and homelessness. He intends to deploy the National Guard and place the city's police under federal control, disputing official data showing a decline in violent crime. Trump's actions follow an assault on a former White House staffer.

title: Why neighbours are 'concerned' with Mark Zuckerberg buying houses in Palo Alto?
content: Mark Zuckerberg's real estate acquisitions in Palo Alto's Crescent Park, totaling over $110 million, have sparked concerns among neighbors. Extensive renovations, including subterranean spaces, have disrupted the neighborhood's peace. Residents feel the community's spirit has diminished due to the billionaire's presence and perceived disregard for local norms, leading to accusations of exploiting loopholes in zoning laws.

title: 'Miss you more than anything'- Heartfelt Hulk Hogan birthday tributes pour in from family members
content: The wrestling world mourned the loss of Hulk Hogan, who passed away on July 24, 2025. On what would have been his 72nd birthday, his ex-wife Linda and son Nick shared emotional tributes on social media, remembering him fondly. Fans worldwide also poured in their wishes, ensuring Hulkamania lives on, as WWE and other promotions honored his legacy.

title: Ukraine's Zelenskyy dials PM Modi, raises issue of oil trade with Russia
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy conveyed to PM Modi about the ongoing Russian invasion, highlighting attacks on Ukrainian cities, including the recent shelling in Zaporizhzhia. Zelenskyy urged India to support peaceful efforts and emphasized that decisions about Ukraine must involve Ukraine's participation. Discussions also covered sanctions against Russia, particularly restricting energy exports.

title: 'Have made it clear ... ': India flags Pak army chief's nuclear threat from US soil
content: India has strongly criticized Pakistan, labeling it an irresponsible nuclear state controlled by its military, following Pak General Asim Munir's threatening remarks. Munir warned of destroying Indian infrastructure affecting water flow and issued a broader nuclear threat. India asserts Pakistan's military dominance undermines democracy and raises concerns about nuclear weapons falling into the wrong hands.

title: Nvidia CEO Huang checks salaries of company's entire 42,000 employees; says: It's a strategy that ‚Ä¶
content: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang personally reviews the compensation of all 42,000 employees monthly, utilizing machine learning to optimize the process. He dismisses rumors of secret stock options, emphasizing generous compensation for all workers. Huang believes in prioritizing employee well-being, which he feels drives overall success. This strategy has significantly benefited Nvidia's leadership, creating billionaires within his management team.

title: Exclusive | Watching Magnus at 2: How 5-yo Aarini became India's No. 1 youngest talent
content: At just five, Delhi‚Äôs Aarini Lahoty is India‚Äôs highest-rated chess player in her age group, boasting a FIDE rating of 1551. Introduced to the game by her father-coach Surendar, Aarini began playing as a toddler and now competes in higher age categories. Balancing studies, chess, and play, she dreams of becoming India‚Äôs youngest IM and GM.

title: SC order on Delhi stray dogs: Protests erupt in Capital, many detained
content: Delhi Police detained animal rights activists protesting at India Gate against the Supreme Court's order to relocate all stray dogs in Delhi-NCR to shelters. The court's directive, addressing rising dog bite incidents, mandates the Delhi government to capture stray dogs and house them in shelters equipped for sterilization and immunization.

title: Woes deepen for Pakistan! India remain No. 1 in latest ODI Rankings
content: Pakistan's cricket team has slipped to fifth position in the ICC ODI rankings. This happened after their defeat against the West Indies. Sri Lanka has now moved up to fourth place. Australia currently holds the third position after winning the 2023 ODI World Cup. India remains at the top of the rankings.

title: Mahomes gets family, brother Jackson‚Äôs support after preseason benching
content: Patrick Mahomes, despite limited playtime in the preseason game against the Cardinals, demonstrated his readiness and leadership. After a brief appearance that included a touchdown pass, Mahomes shifted to a supportive role, advising teammates and offering insights to the coaching staff. Coach Reid praised Mahomes' leadership, emphasizing his importance to the team's Super Bowl aspirations.

title: Tyreek Hill, ex Keeta Vaccaro rush baby Capri to ER; now recovering
content: Tyreek Hill's eight-month-old daughter, Capri, was rushed to the emergency room after developing alarming symptoms, causing significant concern for her mother, Keeta Vaccaro. Doctors swiftly stabilized Capri, and her condition improved by sunrise. Despite ongoing family turmoil, the outpouring of support from fans highlights the shared relief and gratitude for Capri's recovery.

title: Taylor Swift on going public with Travis Kelce: 'Proud of each other'
content: Taylor Swift openly embraced her relationship with Travis Kelce, contrasting sharply with her past privacy, particularly with Joe Alwyn. Swift explained to TIME that they proudly support each other, dismissing the need to hide their romance. Since 2023, they've been publicly affectionate, attending events and date nights, fueling engagement speculations.

title: Trump tariffs: Can Indian refiners do without Russian oil?
content: Kpler reports Indian refiners possess the technical capacity to operate without Russian crude, but this shift would entail significant economic and strategic disadvantages. Replacing Russian oil, which constitutes a substantial portion of India's refinery intake, would elevate feedstock costs and freight charges. This transition would also misalign product yields, making it a commercially challenging endeavor.

title: 'Gill captaining in Duleep Trophy is a massive ... ': Gavaskar
content: Fresh from a stellar Test series against England, Shubman Gill is set to captain North Zone in the upcoming Duleep Trophy. Sunil Gavaskar lauded both the BCCI's decision to prioritise domestic cricket and Gill's commitment to participate. Gill's presence is a significant boost for the tournament, setting a positive example for his teammates.

title: Eli Lilly‚Äôs daily GLP-1 pill shows strong weight loss results without food restrictions
content: Eli Lilly's experimental oral pill, orforglipron, shows promise in obesity treatment, with participants experiencing an average 12% body weight loss in a Phase 3 trial. The study, involving overweight or obese adults, revealed significant weight reduction and improved cardiovascular markers.

title: Magic Johnson & Wife Cookie share heartfelt moment honouring Lakers legend‚Äôs mother
content: Magic Johnson celebrated his mother, Christine Johnson's, 90th birthday with a heartfelt party alongside his wife, Cookie, and their children. The event, filled with love and appreciation, honored Christine's life dedicated to the Lord. Gospel artist Tamela Mann surprised Christine with a performance, making the celebration even more special at Breslin Arena.

title: Bronny James & Parker Whitfield: Romantic dinner date - mark anniversary in style
content: Bronny James, son of Lebron James, celebrated his anniversary with girlfriend Parker Whitfield. The couple shared mirror selfies on Instagram. They have been dating since high school. Bronny is expected to have more playing time with the Los Angeles Lakers next season. Coach Nate McMillan expressed confidence in Bronny's improved performance.

title: Rohit Sharma's new Lamborghini car has the number 3015 - Here's why
content: Indian cricket captain Rohit Sharma has acquired a striking red Lamborghini Urus SE in Mumbai, featuring a personalized '3015' number plate. This number cleverly combines his children's birthdays and links to his iconic jersey number, 45. The high-performance Urus SE, priced at Rs 4.57 crore, boasts impressive speed and power.

title: Delhi: 2 of 6 tiger cubs born last week in zoo die; 4 under close watch
content: Tragedy struck the Delhi Zoo. Two Bengal tiger cubs died within three days. This happened after a litter of six cubs was born. The mother, Aditi, is caring for the remaining four cubs. Zoo officials are monitoring them closely. Supplements are being given to Aditi. The zoo has a history of tiger breeding.

title: CBSE revamps Legal Studies: Students to study triple talaq, Sec 377 & sedition law removal from 2026
content: The CBSE will revise its Legal Studies syllabus for Classes XI and XII to include key legal reforms such as the repeal of triple talaq, the sedition law, and Section 377. The updated curriculum will align with the Bhartiya Nyaya Sanhita (BNS), Bhartiya Nagarik Suraksha Sanhita (BNSS), and Bhartiya Sakshya Adhiniyam (BSA), replacing colonial-era laws. Implementation is scheduled for the 2026‚Äì27 academic session, with updated textbooks to be developed by an expert committee.

title: Air India to suspend nonstop Delhi-Washington flights from Sept 1
content: Air India will suspend its Delhi-Washington nonstop flights from September 1, 2025. This is due to a shortage of wide-body planes. The airline is revamping its legacy fleet. Passengers can rebook or get full refunds. The retrofit program aims to enhance customer experience. Supply chain issues have delayed the completion to October 2028.

title: 'Rohit itna marega na tereko': Yuvraj warns content creator - Watch
content: Yuvraj Singh jokingly warns a content creator who mimics Rohit Sharma. The mimic is popular for his impressions. Rohit Sharma recently bought a Lamborghini Urus SE. The car has a personalized number plate. It reflects his children's birthdays and jersey number. Rohit last played in IPL 2025. India's ODI series against Bangladesh is cancelled. His next challenge is in Australia.

title: 'Baaghi 4' teaser out: Tiger Shroff hunts Sanjay Dutt amid blood and chaos - watch
content: 'Baaghi 4' teaser showcases Tiger Shroff as Ronny, facing off against Sanjay Dutt‚Äôs villain. The intense teaser features brutal action, including fierce female combat. It draws comparisons to Animal and Marco. Written by Sajid Nadiadwala and directed by A. Harsha, the film releases September 5.

title: Wayne Gretzky‚Äôs daughter: Unexpected role in Dustin Johnson‚ÄìBrooks Koepka feud rumours
content: The 2018 Ryder Cup witnessed intense competition. A rumour about Dustin Johnson and Brooks Koepka's alleged feud surfaced. Reports hinted at tension during the flight to Paris. Brooks Koepka denied the fight. He maintained a strong friendship with Johnson. The incident highlights the impact of media pressure on team chemistry. The event shows how narratives can overshadow performance.

title: New I-T Bill passes Lok Sabha: What are top suggestions being included?
content: FM Nirmala Sitharaman  tabled the revised New Income Tax Bill 2025 in Parliament. This followed the withdrawal of the original bill. The new version incorporates recommendations from a Parliamentary Select Committee.

title: Kapil Sharma reveals Shilpa Shetty asks Govinda, ‚ÄòIf Sunita wasn‚Äôt around, then who shot you?‚Äô
content: The Raksha Bandhan episode of 'The Great Indian Kapil Show' was a laughter-filled event featuring celebrity siblings. Kapil Sharma reminded Shilpa Shetty about a humorous question she posed to Govinda after his accidental shooting. Govinda recounted Shilpa's visit, where she inquired about the shooter's identity in Sunita's absence.

title: 'Liberation Day in DC': Trump declares he will end violence in US Capital
content: President Trump declared a "liberation day" for Washington, D.C., vowing to eliminate crime and filth while promising to restore the capital to its former glory. He announced a "crime and beautification" plan, increasing federal patrols and criticizing wasteful spending on projects like the Federal Reserve renovation.

title: Move over Dhoni! Ex-India captain declares who is World No. 1
content: Mohammad Azharuddin praised Syed Kirmani as the world's best wicketkeeper, highlighting his skills against spin and contribution to India's 1983 World Cup victory, at the launch of Kirmani's autobiography. Azharuddin also commended Mohammad Siraj for his outstanding performance in the Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy against England, where he emerged as the leading wicket-taker.

title: 'Blue Peter' icon Biddy Baxter passes away at 92
content: Biddy Baxter, iconic Blue Peter editor, passed away at 92. She shaped the show for over 25 years, introducing the Blue Peter badge and charity drives. Praised as a trailblazer in children‚Äôs TV, she earned an MBE, BAFTA Children‚Äôs Special Award, and the Royal Television Society‚Äôs Baird Medal.

title: Musk‚Äôs breakup trail from friends to relationships: How he messed up with everyone
content: Elon Musk, celebrated for his tech innovations, is also known for strained relationships. From a fallout with Google's Larry Page over AI to a public spat with gamer Asmongold, Musk's ambition often leads to broken ties. Conflicts with Tesla co-founder Martin Eberhard, OpenAI's Sam Altman, and Twitter's Jack Dorsey highlight differing visions.

title: J&K: BSF troops shoot and injure ‚ÄòPakistani intruder' in Kathua district
content: Border Security Force (BSF) troops shot and injured a Pakistani intruder along the International Border in Jammu and Kashmir's Kathua district on Monday. The intruder was part of a group attempting to infiltrate Indian territory near the Hiranagar sector. Alert BSF personnel noticed the group and issued repeated warnings, which were ignored, leading to the firing.

title: Bloating is not normal: How enzyme-based supplements can help reduce water retention
content: Feeling bloated after meals is a common issue, often dismissed as normal, but it signals digestive overload. This occurs when food isn't fully broken down, leading to fermentation and gas. Enzyme-based supplements can aid digestion by breaking down complex foods, improving nutrient absorption, and supporting gut balance, ultimately preventing bloating and promoting overall digestive health.

title: Pigeon feeding row: Jain monk says 'will take up arms if needed'
content: Jain monk Muni Nileshchandra Vijay is threatening a hunger strike starting August 13 over the closure of Dadar Kabutarkhana, a traditional pigeon-feeding site. The BMC closed the area citing health concerns, leading to clashes. Vijay alleges political motivation and vows defiance, even against court orders, claiming widespread Jain support.

title: Alex Ovechkin speaks out: Why he won't join NHL with son Sergei
content: Alex Ovechkin, the NHL's top goal scorer, has dismissed the possibility of playing professionally with his son, Sergei, despite the six-year-old's impressive performance at a recent event in Moscow. Ovechkin humorously noted his age would prevent such a pairing. While a father-son NHL duo won't happen, Ovechkin's sons are showing hockey talent, potentially continuing the family's legacy in the sport.

title: 'Want answers, not attacks': Tharoor backs Rahul's 'vote theft' claims; joins INDIA bloc protest
content: Shashi Tharoor criticised the Election Commission for allegedly attacking Rahul Gandhi instead of addressing serious concerns about electoral integrity. Tharoor emphasised that the EC should prioritise clearing doubts about potential voter list manipulation and vote theft, rather than focusing on procedural formalities like demanding an oath or affidavit from Rahul Gandhi.

title: Watch: Chinese vessels collide on South China Sea while chasing boat
content: Tensions escalate in the South China Sea as a Chinese navy vessel collides with a Chinese coast guard ship during a chase of a Philippine patrol boat near Scarborough Shoal. The Philippine coast guard released video footage of the incident, which occurred during a humanitarian mission. Philippine President Marcos affirmed continued presence in the area to assert Manila's sovereign rights.

title: Online predators prey on young athletes using sextortion
content: A Michigan teen was goaded into sharing an intimate photo that scammers threatened to expose unless he paid up.

title: Texas No. 1 in preseason AP Top 25 for first time
content: For the first time, Texas will open a college football season ranked No. 1 in The Associated Press Top 25.

title: Sources: Eagles eye Dickerson meniscus injury
content: Eagles Pro Bowl guard Landon Dickerson is thought to have suffered a meniscus injury to his right knee, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter.

title: Stafford doesn't practice despite expected return
content: Rams quarterback Matthew Stafford is not practicing Monday after coach Sean McVay said over the weekend that he would return to practice.

title: UFC moving to Paramount with 7-year, $7.7B deal
content: Paramount will become the new home to all Ultimate Fighting Championship events in the U.S. under a seven-year, $7.7 billion agreement with TKO Group.

title: Sources: Fins RB Mattison (neck) out for season
content: Dolphins running back Alexander Mattison underwent season-ending neck surgery Sunday in Chicago, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter.

title: Warner, son of HOF QB, to start for Fresno State
content: Fresno State has named veteran transfer E.J. Warner the team's starting quarterback, sources told ESPN's Pete Thamel.

title: Lions' Norris in concussion protocol, 'doing well'
content: Lions safety Morice Norris is back with the team and has entered the concussion protocol. He is "doing well" after suffering a scary injury in Friday's preseason game, coach Dan Campbell said Monday.

title: Driver dies after medical emergency during race
content: A veteran stock car driver at a North Carolina short track died over the weekend after suffering a medical emergency while competing in a race, officials said.

title: Orlovsky ranks the best NFL QBs in seven different traits: Who makes each top-10 list?
content: Which NFL quarterbacks have the strongest arms, greatest accuracy and best rushing ability? Dan Orlovsky stacked the 10 best in seven skill areas.

title: ESPN's preseason All-America team: The best at every position
content: With the 2025 season right around the corner, we break down the top players, from quarterback to kick returner.

title: MLB playoff contender tiers: The locks, teams with work to do and the long shots
content: As hot streaks and cold spells jumble the postseason picture, here's how sure we are that your team will be playing in October.

title: Where the NBA's biggest remaining free agents stand this offseason
content: The futures of Jonathan Kuminga, Josh Giddey and others remain in flux as the 2025-26 season draws closer.

title: The bloody life of a UFC Octagon
content: Since the UFC's birth in 1993, fighters, coaches and executives have come and gone. The one character that has never changed? The Octagon.

title: Matthew and Brady Tkachuk on Olympic gold, Canada rivalry and new NHL CBA
content: What's it like being on the cover of a video game with their dad? And what are their thoughts on the Winter Games?

title: Ranked: The top 50 players going into the new Premier League seasonÔªø
content: Ahead of the 2025-26 Premier League season, let's rank the best 50 players to keep an eye on. Liverpool and Arsenal dominate the list, but Man United managed some spots, too.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man City eye potential move for Rodrygo
content: Manchester City are possibly looking at a move for Real Madrid's Rodrygo. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Pickups: Luke Keaschall's hot hitting leads weekly adds
content: As the MLB season moves beyond the trade deadline, here are the players you should be claiming off the fantasy waiver wire.

title: NWSL Power Rankings: Can anyone stop the Kansas City Current?
content: The KC Current extended their league lead to 12 points with 11 games remaining thanks to their 13th win of the season. Wow! That and more in ESPN's NWSL Power Rankings.

title: MLS Power Rankings: San Diego keeps climbing as rivals slip
content: Is San Diego the best expansion team in MLS history? Chucky Lozano & Co. rise in our latest rankings.

title: üèà Ranking all 136 FBS teams ahead of the season
content: From Tier 1 to Tier 20, David Hale ranks all 136 college football program into tiers ahead of the 2025 season.

title: üèÜ Passan's 2025 MLB trade deadline awards
content: Here's what we learned from this year's deals -- and titles for the teams with the most interesting elements of trade season.

title: üèÄ Crypto group says it organized sex toy tosses
content: A self-described cryptocurrency enthusiast told ESPN that the recent sex toy stunts that have disrupted WNBA games were orchestrated by a group he is involved in.

title: üèà ESPN acquiring NFL Network, RedZone from NFL
content: ESPN is acquiring the NFL Network and other NFL media assets, including the linear rights to the league's popular RedZone channel, in a deal that will see the NFL get a 10% equity stake in the all-sports network, it was announced.

title: üßÇ 49ers' Kittle bemoans NFL's smelling salts ban
content: The NFL is banning the use of smelling salts and ammonia packets before and during all games, a ruling that has upset 49ers TE George Kittle.

title: üëä Khabib hopes McGregor changes lifestyle
content: Retired mixed martial arts legend Khabib Nurmagomedov said he hopes former rival Conor McGregor changes how he is living or "it will be punishment all his life."

title: How Jordyn Jackson, Saniyah Hall fit at Maryland, USC
content: Breaking down the fits of every five-star commitment, including No. 1 Saniyah Hall and No. 8 Jordyn Jackson.

title: Kapil Mishra Hails Court Stray Dog Order, Credits NDTV Campaign
content: Delhi Minister Kapil Mishra on Monday welcomed the Supreme Courts order to relocate stray dogs from residential areas to shelters, saying the move aligns with the Delhi governments existing plans and will make implementation easier.

title: 'India Day' Celebrations Delayed In Ireland Over 'Racist' Attacks
content: One of Ireland's largest celebrations of Indian culture was postponed following "violent attacks" on the community in recent months, the Ireland India Council which promotes ties between the countries announced.

title: Why More Women Are Switching To Reusable Menstrual Products
content: About 12 billion disposable pads and 7 billion tampons go into US landfills every year, taking up to 800 years to degrade.

title: What Makes Washington DC So Special?
content: President Donald Trump's repeated threats to impose his will on Washington has brought its unique status back into the spotlight.

title: 20-Year-Old Woman Gang-Raped In Maharashtra, 4 Charged: Cops
content: A 20-year-old woman from Telangana was allegedly gang-raped in Beed district of Maharashtra, prompting the police to register a case against four persons, an official said on Monday.

title: US Drug Regulator's Ousted Vaccine Chief Vinay Prasad Is Returning To Agency
content: A Food and Drug Administration official is getting his job back as the agency's top vaccine regulator, less than two weeks after he was pressured to step down at the urging of biotech executives, patient groups and conservative allies of Trump.

title: Trump Says Ukraine, Russia Will Have To Swap Some Land For Peace
content: US President Donald Trump said that both Ukraine and Russia would have to cede land to each other to end the war and that his talks with Russian President Vladimir Putin would be aimed at taking the temperature on a possible deal.

title: 1 Dead, Dozens Hurt Or Trapped In Explosion At US Steel Plant
content: An explosion at a US Steel plant near Pittsburgh left one dead and dozens injured or trapped under the rubble, with emergency workers on site trying to rescue victims, officials said.

title: Spain Orders Town To Scrap Motion Restricting Muslim Festivities
content: Spain's leftist government ordered a town to drop a ban on religious celebrations in municipal sports facilities, a measure critics say was aimed at blocking longstanding Muslim festivities.

title: "Opposition Wants Digital Data, But Poll Body Giving Paper Data": DMK's Kanimozhi To NDTV
content: Lamenting the state of parliamentary democracy, DMK's Kanimozhi today cited how opposition MPs were stopped and then briefly detained when they led a march to the Election Commission, alleging vote theft.

title: 4 Children, 2 Adults Killed As Fire Rips Through House In Maryland
content: A fire ripped through a house in Charles County, Maryland, killing four children and two adults, authorities said.

title: Greta Thunberg, Activists Plan New Aid Flotilla To Gaza
content: Greta Thunberg said she and a Palestinian activist group plan to sail a new flotilla loaded with humanitarian aid to Gaza to break the "illegal Israeli siege".

title: 'We'll Fix This': Delhi's Action Plan After Supreme Court's Stray Dog Ruling
content: The debate over stray dogs in Delhi has now moved from the streets to the highest court in the country and will soon move to the city's shelters.

title: US Designates Baloch Liberation Army As Foreign Terrorist Organisation
content: The United States is designating separatist group the Baloch Liberation Army (BLA) as a foreign terrorist organisation.

title: Colombian Senator, Presidential Hopeful Miguel Uribe Dies 2 Months After Shooting
content: A Colombian senator and presidential hopeful whose shooting at a political rally in June recalled some of the darkest chapters of the country's drug-fueled violence died.

title: Fistful Of Dollars, Rice For Vietnam Farmers Displaced For Trump Golf Club
content: The golf resort, for which construction is scheduled to begin next month, is offering thousands of villagers compensation to leave the land that has provided their livelihood for years or decades.

title: Mallikarjun Kharge Hosts Dinner For INDIA bloc MPs In Delhi
content: Congress president Mallikarjun Kharge hosted a dinner for the INDIA bloc MPs on Monday that was attended by the likes of Sharad Pawar, Sonia Gandhi and Rahul Gandhi.

title: Kamal Haasan Demands Machine-Readable Electoral Rolls, Slams Rahul Gandhi's Detention
content: Actor-turned-politician Kamal Haasan launched a sharp attack on the Election Commission of India (ECI) today, raising what he called "grave questions" about the integrity of the country's electoral rolls.

title: "Conspiracy," Says Karnataka's Ousted Minister, Plans To Meet Rahul Gandhi
content: KN Rajanna, the Karnataka minister and close aide of Chief Minister Siddaramaiah who was dropped from the ministry today over his comments on voter theft, has said he has become the victim of a "big conspiracy".

title: Top Court Slams "Trend" That 'No Justice In Courts If Politicians Involved'
content: Observing high court judges were "in no way inferior" to the ones in the top court, the Supreme Court on Monday directed a litigant and his lawyers to tender an unconditional apology to a Telangana High Court judge.

title: R.G. Kar protest rally: two Kolkata doctors appear before police
content: Dr. Punya Brata Gun and Dr. Tamonas Chaudhuri are associated with Abhaya Mancha, a civil society group formed to seek justice for the R.G. Kar victim

title: SC refuses to intervene in Bombay HC ban on feeding of pigeons in ‚Äòkabutarkhanas‚Äô
content: Bench says a parallel hearing on the issue won‚Äôt be proper as proceedings are already pending before the High Court

title: Sacking of Rajanna exposes Congress‚Äô ‚Äòanti-Dalit‚Äô face, says BJP
content: The BJP has maintained that the sacking of Scheduled Tribes leader K.N. Rajanna from the Cabinet over his views on ‚Äúvoter theft‚Äù had revealed the ‚Äútrue anti-Dalit face‚Äù of the Congress

title: As public outcry grows over rotten meat supply, CM Omar Abdullah orders screening of check posts at J&K borders¬†
content: ‚ÄúOffenders posing risks to public health must be prosecuted under the relevant provisions of the Food Safety and Standards Act; criminal proceedings will be initiated against the most serious violators,‚Äù says CM

title: Govt. land: Revenue quasi-judicial authorities to face action if their decisions are not in good faith
content: Revenue quasi-judicial authorities now cannot go scot-free if they issue any orders with mala fide intentions with respect to government land. The government has initiated the process of disciplinary action against a few such authorities who allegedly pronounced orders with vested interests to favour those who encroached upon government land

title: Dharali flash floods: 43 missing, 1,308 rescued, says Uttarakhand govt.¬†¬†
content: Commissioner of Garhwal region Vinay Shankar Pandey says those missing include nine Army personnel, eight locals from Dharali and five from nearby areas, one person from Tehri district, 13 from Bihar and six from Uttar Pradesh

title: Two fishermen die as fishing vessel capsizes at Muthalapozhi
content: Three people sustain injuries in the accident, while the condition of one injured is slated to be serious

title: Environment activist raises concern over cutting of trees in Bihar‚Äôs Magadh University for PM‚Äôs meeting
content: Activist Brijnandan Pathak has written a letter to PM Modi addressing the issue of damaging greenery in the name of his public meeting

title: Why can‚Äôt Army deploy women officers to counter terror, insurgency in times of emergency, SC asks in a judgment
content: Court dismisses the Centre‚Äôs arguments about excluding women from the Judge Advocate General (JAG) branch, directs it to publish a common merit list for all candidates

title: Security upgraded for Tejashwi, Samrat¬†and others ahead of Bihar polls
content: Opposition leader Tejashwi Yadav‚Äôs security cover enhanced to ‚ÄòZ‚Äô category, while Deputy CM Samrat Choudhary will be covered under Z+ (ASL) category

title: M.S. Karadi, Sumitra Jadhav of the BJP elected Mayor, Deputy Mayor in Vijayapura
content: After their victory, the winners were seen wearing shawls with the initials, BRP, short for Basanagouda Ramanagouda Patil Yatnal

title: Did Trump slap tariffs for not getting India-Pakistan ceasefire ‚Äòcredit‚Äô, asks Opposition
content: At the Parliament Standing Committee on External Affairs, Foreign Secretary Vikram Misri refuted recent reports that India was planning to put on hold plans to procure new U.S. weapons and aircraft

title: Government considers raising parental income limit for post and pre-matric scholarships for Scheduled Tribe students
content: Officials say discussions are also on about revising the same for various OBC, and SC student scholarships as well

title: Opposition MPs condemn Israeli military campaign in Gaza Strip
content: Reactivate India-Palestine Committee in the Indian Parliament, suggests Palestine Ambassador Abu Shawesh

title: Coast Guards of India, Sri Lanka vow to strengthen maritime partnership
content: Both sides reaffirm their commitment to address contemporary maritime challenges and promote safety, security, and environmental protection in their shared waters

title: Facing backlash, Punjab government withdraws controversial land pooling policy
content: The policy had invited sharp flak from farmers and farm labourer outfits, landholders, and political parties, even as experts in agriculture and economics perceived the policy to be ‚Äònon-transparent‚Äô and ‚Äòfaulty‚Äô, raising questions over the government‚Äôs intentions

title: Karnataka is defining emerging technologies, not just embracing them: CM
content: Karnataka has over 150,000 start-ups of which 50% are from Bengaluru and these city firms alone raised $71.19 billion in funding so far, says Ekroop Caur, Secretary, Department of Electronics, IT, BT and Science and Technology

title: LDF, BJP on confrontational path over TDB decision to hold global Ayyappa devotees‚Äô meet at Sabarimala
content: BJP former State president Kummanam Rajasekharan terms proposed conference a cover for LDF government to undermine Sabarimala‚Äôs ancient traditions and practices

title: Tension mounts in Uttar Pradesh‚Äôs Fatehpur as mob vandalises tomb¬†
content: Around 1,000 members of right-wing outfits carrying saffron flags barged into the tomb; they claimed the structure used to be a temple; it led to a confrontation

title: 700 public services will be available on WhatsApp from August 15, says Chandrababu Naidu
content: CM tells officials to launch awareness campaigns to encourage people to use them without the need to visit govt. offices; he inaugurates Aware 2.0, an upgraded RTGS module capable of forecasting rainfall and analysing real-time water data

title: Political row erupts in Kerala over Governor‚Äôs directive to observe ‚ÄòPartition horror day‚Äô
content: Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan terms directive ‚Äòunconstitutional and unacceptable‚Äô. Raj Bhavan had instructed universities last week to organise seminars and commemorative events, including street plays and dramas, highlighting ‚Äúthe trauma of India‚Äôs Partition‚Äù

title: IISER Kolkata scholar‚Äôs death: Family alleges ‚Äòinstitutional murder‚Äô
content: IISER Kolkata has formed a fact-finding committee to investigate the circumstances surrounding the recent, unnatural death of PhD scholar Anamitra Roy

title: State cooperative election authorities suggest the use of EVMs in cooperative society elections¬†
content: The Cooperative Election Authority held its first consultative meeting with State Cooperative Election Authorities to develop a mechanism for conducting free and fair elections in the sector

title: Pay ‚Çπ10 lakh to parents of dead child, rights panel tells hospital
content: Panel directs Pathanamthitta District Police Chief to register a case of culpable homicide not amounting to murder against authorities and doctors of Mar Thoma Medical Mission Centre at Ranni where Class I student was taken for treatment

title: NC, PDP flay Centre‚Äôs stand on L-G‚Äôs powers to nominate 5 MLAs to J&K Legislative Assembly
content: ‚ÄúIt strikes at the heart of parliamentary democracy, ignores the constitutional spirit of aid and advice, and sets a dangerous precedent where unelected appointees can rewrite the people‚Äôs verdict,‚Äù says NC MLA Tanvir Sadiq ¬†

title: Lok Sabha passes two tax Bills without debate; Rijiju slams Opposition over disruptions
content: Union Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman introduced the Income-Tax (No 2) Bill and the Taxation Laws (Amendment) Bill in the Lok Sabha when no Opposition member was present in the House

title: As per 123-year rainfall data, many locations in State vulnerable to disasters in August
content: A map drawn by IMD scientist, using machine learning and GIS techniques and rainfall data from 110 weather stations in Kerala between 1901 and 2023, indicates the pattern

title: Drone-based assistance for fishermen in sea launched in Machilipatnam
content: As part of the pilot project, drones will be operated thrice everyday for three days to monitor the condition of sea and movement of boats, says Machilipatnam Assistant Director (Fisheries)

title: Plaster of Paris idols seized in Dharwad
content: With the Ganesh festival fast approaching, the district administration has intensified the drive against those selling PoP idols

title: Health Minister calls for stronger anti-ragging measures in medical colleges
content: Medical colleges to hold essay contests, street plays, posters, and interactive sessions from August 12 to 18 as per NMC guidelines

title: YSRCP slams free bus scheme as ‚Äòfraud on women‚Äô
content: With its conditions, the scheme is impractical for long-distance and inter-district journeys, says party spokesperson

title: Country boat fishermen in Thoothukudi get kerosene cards and subsidised life jackets
content: In Thoothukudi, the target is to provide 6,199 life jackets to fishermen taking the country boats and subsidised kerosene cards have been allotted to 148 fishermen, says Minister

title: Call for justice: Parents, students associations demand probe into student suicides in Nellore
content: Student union leaders demand that the State government immediately order a high-level judicial inquiry into colleges operating hostel campuses in violation of the prescribed guidelines

title: Collector orders action in Dachepalli BC Boys‚Äô Hostel incident
content: Hostel Welfare Officer has been removed from duty, citing negligence in the discharge of her responsibilities, and an outsourcing staff member has been terminated from service

title: Andhra Pradesh GoM to review district, mandal, and village names, boundaries in first meet on August 13
content: Revenue Minister invites public to submit representations; alleges previous YSRCP reorganisation caused hardships and disputes

title: Primary school teachers¬†on padayatra today in protest against govt. failure to keep promise
content: They say that Siddaramaiah promised in September last year to designate them as Graduate Primary Teacher and revise the C&R Rules of 2017

title: Haris Chirackal says MCH colleagues sought to vilify him
content: Anguish over the hasty manner in which his colleagues had set out to ‚Äúnail him‚Äù and make him out to be a pilferer before everyone, he writes in social media message

title: Home Minister assures peaceful ZPTC byelections in Pulivendula and Ontimitta amid rising tensions, allegations
content: BC Welfare Minister S. Savita charges YSRCP chief with spreading falsehoods in a bid to deceive voters

title: 'Fight for One Man, One Vote': Rahul after stir near EC HQ; refuses to sign oath

title: 2025 PLL Playoffs: Bracket, schedule, teams and players to watch
content: the 2025 premier lacrosse league regular season is complete . the playoff bracket is set for the Maryland Whipsnakes, Philadelphia Waterdogs and California Redwoods . each team gets at least one week off now, with the two top seeds earning a bye .

title: PPR rankings: Top 100 for 2025
content: field Yates' 2025 fantasy football rankings will be updated throughout the preseason to reflect any changes in his view on players for the upcoming season . the rankings below are for PPR formats . he explains how Stefon Diggs could bounce back and put up big numbers in fantasy .

title: üèà Ultimate Fantasy Football Cheat Sheet
content: the ultimate ESPN fantasy football cheat sheet is a curated rundown of all the names we've been talking about this preseason . if you want to read more about sleepers, busts, rookies, backups, value picks and more, the analysis is available for you to pore through .

title: NFL preseason Week 1 takeaways: Tyler Shough's debut a mixed bag for Saints
content: the 2025 preseason kicked off Thursday and continued through Sunday . several rookies played their first snaps, whether they were rookies or offseason acquisitions . quarterback jamaree Caldwell has shown why the Chargers selected him .

title: AP preseason poll reaction: One big number for every team
content: the first AP poll of the 2025 college football season has been released . Texas begins the season at No. 1 followed by Penn State, Ohio State, Clemson and Georgia . the defending champion and third-ranked Ohio State is a rematch of last season's college football playoff semifinal .

title: Projecting the top 10 freshmen for the 2025 season
content: the start of the college football season is approaching . many true freshmen are battling for roles -- or even starting spots -- on their teams . it didn't take long for Jeremiah Smith and Ryan Williams to establish themselves as difference-makers .

title: Sign up and play for free!
content: our winner earns the title of ultimate champion and will receive epic prizes including a championship trophy, ring, and personalized jersey . join a public league with other fans . make lineup moves, savvy free agent pick ups, and trade with friends wherever you are .

title: NFL Future Power Rankings: We stacked all 32 teams' long-term expectations
content: in our annual Future Power Rankings, we ranked which teams are primed to be among the league's best over the next three seasons (2025 through 2027) each of the four categories was weighted to create the overall score: quarterback (20%), roster (30%), front office (25%) and coaching (25%). the results are based on how well each team is positioned for the future.
